original_text: Realty Income Corp.: 1Q Earnings Snapshot Realty Income Announces Operating Results For First Quarter 2018 Earnings Reaction History: Realty Income Corp., 50.0% Follow-Through Indicator, 1.9% Sensitive After-Hours Earnings Report for May 8, 2018: DIS, OXY, MAR, EA, MNST, SLF, PAA, O, CA, FANG, XEC, GDDY Realty Income Corp. Q1 adjusted earnings Beat Estimates
